subject: Shipping of my order
description_text:
Hello,

I ordered my pedals over 2 days ago now and havent recived any info on
shipping, could you give me an update on that?

#SSN2801

Thats my order number.

conversations.body_text: I didnt pay for express shipping for the product not beeing shipped for this long.   Could somebody please look at this issue?

Hi Robs Mörschi,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We are currently on an 8-day holiday period. Your order has been shipped from our German warehouse. Thank you for your understanding and patience.    https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326626784DE

That's great, thank you very much.

support@simsonn.com
